SharpMermaid
Table of Contents

Root properties

{
  "SolutionPath": "./TestSolution.sln",
  "OutputDirectory": "./Diagrams",
  "FileType": ".mmd",
  "Diagrams": []
}

SolutionPath

Path to the solution file.

Type: string
Required: yes
Default: - Validation:

  • Must not be empty: "Error: SolutionPath is required"
  • Must end with .sln: "Error: SolutionPath must point to a .sln file"
  • Must be a valid file path (relative or absolute): "Error: SolutionPath is not a valid file path"

OutputDirectory

Output directory for all generated diagrams (overridable per diagram).

Type: string
Required: yes
Default: - Validation:

  • Must not be empty: "Error: OutputDirectory is required"
  • Must be a valid directory path: "Error: OutputDirectory is not a valid directory path"
  • Can be relative or absolute.

FileType

File type for all generated diagrams.

Type: string
Required: yes
Default: -
Supported: .mmd and .md Validation:

  • Must be either .mmd or .md: "Error: FileType must be either '.mmd' or '.md'"
  • Must start with a dot (.): "Error: FileType must begin with a dot"

Diagrams

An array of diagram configurations.
Each item must contain exactly one property,
where the key is the diagram type and the value is its specific configuration.

Type: array
Required: yes
Default: -
Supported diagram types: Validation:

  • Must not be empty: "Error: Diagrams must contain at least one item"
  • Each item must contain exactly one property: "Error: Each diagram entry must define exactly one diagram type"
  • Diagram type must be supported: "Error: Unsupported diagram type '{name}'"
  • PhysicalProject: Generates a physical project layout diagram.

Example:

{
  "Diagrams": [
    {
      "PhysicalProject": {}
    }
  ] 
}
